content.previewText: Secure your account with two-factor authentication
content.title: Secure your account with two-factor authentication
content.firstParagraph: To keep your account secure, use the following verification code:
content.thirdParagraph: Enter this code in the verification screen to continue.
content.footer: If you didn't request this email, you can safely ignore it.

errors.INVALID_BACKUP_CODE: The backup code you entered is invalid.
errors.INVALID_CODE: The verification code you entered is incorrect.
errors.INVALID_TWO_FACTOR_COOKIE: Your verification session is invalid. Please request a new code.
errors.OTP_HAS_EXPIRED: The verification code has expired. Please request a new one.
errors.TOO_MANY_ATTEMPTS_REQUEST_NEW_CODE: Too many attempts. Please request a new verification code.

error.generic: Unable to resend the verification code. Please try again.
error.rateLimitExceeded: You have requested too many verification codes. Please wait before trying again.

resend.success: A new verification code has been sent. Please check your email.

error.generic: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

metadata.description: Secure your account with two-factor verification.
metadata.title: Two-Factor Authentication

header.title: Two-Factor Verification
header.description: Enter the verification code sent to your email to continue.

resend.ready: Didn't receive the email? <button>Resend verification code</button>
resend.cooldown: Didn't receive the email? Resend in <seconds></seconds> seconds

error.generic: Unable to send the verification code. Please try again.
error.rateLimitExceeded: You have requested too many verification codes. Please wait before trying again.

sendTwoFactorOtp.success: A verification code has been sent. Please check your email.
